attributes.action: Keep Grassroots Football Going During Lockdown & Help Mental & Fitness Wellbeing
attributes.additional_details:
It is well known that outdoor transmission of the Covid 19 is minimal if at all happening. All grassroots football clubs have guidelines & processes in place to make football safe. 
Benefits: 
Physical health maintained or increased during restrictions 

Mental health maintained or increased due to social aspect of sport & looking forward to the activity each week. 

Improves parents mental health. Taking your child & watching your child will support adult mental health
attributes.background: We feel it is only right for all Adults & Children to be able to carry on with Grassroots Football whilst in Lockdown.  All clubs have guidelines which they follow in a safe way and it is proven to be safe outdoors.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow Grassroots football to keep going for juniors: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557169

Allow outdoor amateur football to continue during lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557467
